story.storybody:
Shimla, Jun 1 (PTI) Himachal Pradesh Industries minister Mukesh Agnihotri today lashed out at the opposition for trying to dislodge the democratically-elected Congress government and said that the government is stable and would complete its full term.

He termed Chief Minister Virbhadra Singh as a fighter who emerges stronger everytime he is attacked or targeted.

"Virbhadra Singh is being probed for the same charges simultaneously by CBI, Enforcement Directorate and Income Tax Department, but the CM is a fighter and emerges stronger everytime he is attacked or targeted," Agnihotri said.

He said that the government was concentrating on development and he has no doubts that the government will not only complete its full term but also come to power after next elections.

"I have no doubt that the govt will not only complete its full term but also come to power after next election. PTI PCL RCB ZMN RCB
story.shortheadline: Govt stable, will complete full term: HP Industries minister
story.storytitle: Govt stable, will complete full term: HP Industries minister
